name: Nuck The Adventures
description:
this game is in development. who wants to help can call me in discord: Nuck#8075 . our team is very small, but we want to make a funny game. I'm the only programmer and I'm in learning, plus over time I want to do a job well done. anyone who has any criticism or idea, I'll read for sure.

Nuck The Adventures by Nuck - Game Jolt
